template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nogen har et spørgsmål vedr. din annonce
template.s_description:
Hej {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) sendte dig en besked vedrørende din annonce {ITEM_TITLE}:

{COMMENT}

Med venlig hilsen,

{WEB_LINK}

Hej {USER_NAME},

Valider venligst din registrering ved at klikke på dette link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Mange tak!

Med venlig hilsen,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You've successfully registered for {WEB_LINK}.

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hej {FRIEND_NAME},

Din ven {USER_NAME} vil gerne dele denne annonce med dig {ITEM_TITLE}.

Besked:

{COMMENT}

Med venlig hilsen,

{WEB_TITLE}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Ny annonce in the last hour
template.s_description:
Hej {USER_NAME},

Nye annoncer er blevet publiceret indenfor den seneste time. Tag et kig på dem:

{ADS}

-------------

For at afmelde denne annonceagent, kan du klikke på dette link: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Ny annonce in the last day
template.s_description:
Hej {USER_NAME},

Nye annoncer er blevet publiceret indenfor det seneste døgn. Tag et kig på dem:

{ADS}

-------------

For at afmelde denne annonceagent, kan du klikke på dette link: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Ny annonce in the last week
template.s_description:
Hej {USER_NAME},

Nye annoncer er blevet publiceret indenfor den seneste uge. Tag et kig på dem:

{ADS}

-------------

For at afmelde denne annonceagent, kan du klikke på dette link: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Hej {USER_NAME},

En ny annonce er blevet publiceret, tjek den ud!

{ADS}

-------------

For at afmelde denne annonceagent, kan du klikke på dette link: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Someone commented on the listing {ITEM_TITLE}.

Commenter: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Commenter's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, but you can still edit or delete the listing {ITEM_TITLE} for a short period of time.

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

If you register as a user, you will have full access to editing options.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this email.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact email: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

You can edit this listing by clicking on the following link: {EDIT_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

We've sent you this e-mail because you've requested a password reminder. Follow this link to recover it: {PASSWORD_LINK}

The link will be deactivated in 24 hours.

If you didn't request a password reminder, please ignore this message. This request was made from IP {IP_ADDRESS} on {DATE_TIME}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Du har anmodet om at skifte email
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME}

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested an e-mail change. Please confirm this new e-mail address by clicking on the following validation link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hej {USER_NAME},

Validaer venligst oprettelsen af din annonceagent ved at klikke på dette link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Mange tak!

Med venlig hilsen,

{WEB_LINK}

Hej: {COMMENT_AUTHOR},



Din kommentar til annoncen:
{ITEM_TITLE} er blevet godkendt af en Administrator.


- -

Med venlig hilsen... {WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because you’ve published a listing at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this e-mail.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Even if you're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, you can still edit or delete your listing:

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a new user has been created at {WEB_LINK}.

User details:

Name: {USER_NAME}
E-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nogen har et spørgsmål til dig
template.s_description:
Hej {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) har sendt dig en besked:

{COMMENT}

Med venlig hilsen,

{WEB_LINK}

There's a new comment on the listing: {ITEM_TITLE}.

Author: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Author's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

{WEB_LINK}

Hej: {ADMIN_NAME},



Administrator hos {WEB_LINK} har oprettet en Admin konto til dig, med:

  • Brugernavn: {USERNAME}

  • PassWord: {PASSWORD}

Din adgang sker via via kontrolpanel,
LogIND her: {WEB_ADMIN_LINK}.


- -

Med venlig hilsen... {WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: Fra {WEB_TITLE} - Din annonce er ved at udløbe
template.s_description:
Hej: {USER_NAME},


BLOT TIL ORIENTERING
Din annonce {ITEM_TITLE} er ved at udløbe.


- -

Med venlig hilsen... {WEB_LINK}
